org.apache.paimon.query

Interface QueryServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KvQueryServer

    public interface QueryServer
    An interface for the Server running on each Node in the cluster. This server is responsible for serving requests coming from the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InetSocketAddress getServerAddress()
      Returns the address the server is listening to.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the server and all related thread pools.
      void start()
      Starts the server.

    • Method Detail

        Server address.

      • start

    throws Throwable
        Starts the server.
